bank_name.description: Name of the bank which have issued the card

card-security-code.description: Card security code (CSC, CVD, CVV, CVC and SPC) as embossed or printed on the card.

cc-number.description: credit-card number as encoded on the card.

iin.description: International Issuer Number (First eight digits of the credit card number

issued.description: Initial date of validity or issued date.

description: A payment card like credit card, debit card or any similar cards which can be used for financial transactions.
name: credit-card
